alert.note: Alert for Guaynabo; San Juan (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 31 at 7:28PM AST until January 31 at 9:45PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Guaynabo in Puerto Rico... San Juan in Puerto Rico... * Until 945 PM AST. * At 728 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Emergency managers reported several roads already flooded, and rivers continue to rise. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
